definition: to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile

sentences.english: VOICE: What do logarithms, biology and logic have in common?
sentences.chinese: 对数，生物学和逻辑学有甚么共同点呢？

sentences.english: Logic is taught here as a separate subject.
sentences.chinese: 逻辑学在这里是作为单独一门课来讲授的。

sentences.english: First and foremost he is a logician.
sentences.chinese: 他首先是一个逻辑学家。

sentences.english: Logicians concerned with this have tried to develop paraconsistent logics .
sentences.chinese: 关心这个问题的逻辑学家开发了次协调逻辑。

sentences.english: Greek logician, possibly author ofthe liar paradox.
sentences.chinese: 希腊逻辑学家，一说是檄谴者悖论的作者。

sentences.english: This article deconstructs the Mou Reasoning, one of the important concepts in the Mobian Logic.
sentences.chinese: “侔式推理”是“墨辩逻辑学”的一个重要概念。

sentences.english: Modern logicians regard it as little more than tautology.
sentences.chinese: 现代旳逻辑学家仅仅把它看作同义反复。

sentences.english: Johnson was a logician who had also lectured on philosophical psychology.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊是一位开设哲学心理学讲座的逻辑学家。

sentences.english: A:You'll have to take a make-up exam in logic.
The theory of logics provides an effective tool for the development of Artificial Intelligence( AI ).
sentences.chinese: 逻辑学的理论为人工智能的发展提供了有力的工具。

sentences.english: Logic is the science of argument and critical thinking.
sentences.chinese: 逻辑学是论证与缜思的科学。
美国科学家和逻辑学家。

sentences.english: The logics with probabilistic characterized is suitable for expressing the states of nano-device.
sentences.chinese: 具有概率特性的逻辑学适合表示纳米器件的状态。

sentences.english: The theory of logics provides an effective tool for the development of Artificial Intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 逻辑学的理论为人工智能的发展提供了有力的工具。

sentences.english: Two broad sub-fields of philosophy are logic and the history of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 哲学涵盖很广的两个次领域为逻辑学和哲学史。

sentences.english: The founder is famous logician J.
sentences.chinese: 创始人是美国著名的逻辑学家J。
